channel.title: native / changelog / stable
channel.description: changelog on the stable release channel

item.title: v2.3.2
item.description:
1. fix(ovp): change macro mapping to underscore
  2. feat(core): expose flowplayer:umd document-level event

item.title: v2.3.1
item.description:
1. fix(core): iOS uses loadeddata for video dimension props; (#948)
  2. fix(ovp): do not use Date.parse (#947)
  3. fix(drm): more finegrained multi-drm support (#942)
  4. fix(menu): active menu should be a singleton state
  5. fix(hls): handle live stream drift on play resume (#930)
  6. feat(drm): move dash and fairplay to drm plugin
  7. feat(drm): move HLS drm into drm plugin
  8. feat(drm): implement fairplay drm

item.title: v2.2.0
item.description:
1. fix: added svg icons
  2. fix(hls): handle several media errors during a long session (#903)
  3. fix(share): handle share.iframe is Boolean case from ovp; (#907)
  4. fix: enlarge floating buttons
  5. fix: add flag to hide standard controls from floating player
  6. fix: scaling button
  7. fix: add portrait default
  8. feat(gemius): initial implementation
  9. fix: warning if floating player in iframe
  10. fix: fine-tuning
  11. fix: keep header
  12. fix: add bigger buttons for mute and close
  13. fix: pause playback when floating player closed

item.title: v2.1.8
item.description:
1. fix(ovp): adjust offset by 1 so that setSrc works when livestream starts
  2. fix: do not trigger error if there are working sources (#893)
  3. fix: playlist assert fails if controls:true (#888)

item.title: v2.1.6
item.description:
1. feat(iframe): inter-frame-communication (#886)
  2. fix(qsel): standard resolution labels
  3. fix: keep the last word always
  4. fix: safety check to prevent infinite loop
  5. fix: recover from errornous fragment (#849)
  6. fix(ovp): propogate http error messages to the player (#882)

item.title: v2.1.5
item.description: 1. fix: allow to use ads plugin UI flags in player config (#866)

item.title: v2.1.4
item.description:
1. fix(ovp): allow mixed ovp and inline config for playlist (#864)
  2. fix: focus menu only when is-accessibility (#870)
  3. fix: content gets scrolled back to player while playing

item.title: v2.1.3
item.description:
1. fix: close menu when no longer visible / control bar toggled off
  2. fix: truncate long title and description (#852)
  3. fix: scrollbars are displayed by default for the title in IE11 (#859)
  4. fix(core): rewind should work with setState (#861)
  5. fix: exception on IE11 (#857)
  6. fix: close menu when no longer visible when control bar toggled off
  7. fix(cuepoints): monkey patch hls _clearTrack internals (#841)
